name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the charm of Pikachu to life with this rainy train station

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the magic of a rainy day at a train station with Pikachu by your side

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the magic of a rainy day at a train station with Pikachu by your side. This live wallpaper captures the cozy, serene atmosphere of a rainy day, featuring Pikachu waiting at the station as raindrops fall softly around. Whether you're a Pokémon fan or just enjoy a peaceful, nostalgic vibe, this wallpaper will transform your browser into a tranquil scene.

**Key Features:**
- **Popular Website Shortcuts**: Easily access your favorite websites directly from the wallpaper for quick navigation.
- **Date and Time Display**: Stay informed with a stylish clock and date display, blending seamlessly into the design.

This extension brings both beauty and functionality, making it a perfect choice for those who appreciate a touch of cuteness and practicality in their browser experience. Download "Yağmurlu Bir Günde Tren İstasyonunda Pikachu Pokemon" today and let Pikachu brighten your day!
